taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click the table (or column) and select Insert computed column.
step.stepresult: The computed column is added to table. You can move the column with arrows left and right.

step.cmd: On the General tab, change the default Column name assigned by the system.
On the Translation tab, set the Translation of the widget.
On the Presentation tab, set the Type of the widget.
On the Computation tab, set the Computation, and the parameters.
step.info: See section for more details on computations and their parameters.
